thread.section_title: Viva Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Viva Expeditions | vivaexpeditions.com
thread.title: Jack Helen
thread.title_full: Viva Expeditions reviewed by Jack Helen

author: Jack Helen
title: Jack Helen
text: Emma of Viva Expeditions was the best that I have ever dealt with and we do a fair bit of travel. Everything she said was spot on, our pick-ups on time, quality hotels and car rentals. One of the most enjoyable trips I ever had. Thank you so much Emma you are one of a kind!
